content:
That sounds like a perfect day out! I'm so glad to hear that Max was fascinated by the T-Rex fossil - it's great to see kids so engaged and curious about the natural world. And what a lovely way to follow up the museum visit with a picnic in Central Park! The lake is such a beautiful spot, and I'm sure Max had a blast running around and exploring.

It's wonderful that you and your family could relax and enjoy some quality time together, surrounded by nature. Days like those are truly special, and I'm sure Max will remember this trip to the museum and the park for a long time.

By the way, did you and your family have a favorite food or snack during the picnic? And did Max have a favorite activity or game to play in the park?
